item.description:
I learned about this quiz night from Trivia King, Ray W and was quite impressed with the $200 cash prize and the entertaining game show format.

Join for a good time of intellectual stimulation and a few drinks which cost $6 for beer and $10 for cocktails.

We NEED you this time because last time our team, Moss Piglets (look it up to know what it is) placed last :(  We started out strong but so didn't everyone else. Fellow drinking buddies, Harsh, Jess and Don are very smart and great company but we were just outnumbered because all of the other teams had six members. You can HELP us do BETTER so please join us.

THE BIG QUIZ THING Boston's only live quiz spectacular! and it is FREE at Club Oberon.

Featuring the grand prize of...$200! Plus much, much more

With video puzzles including. . .The Bipolar Movie Challenge

And the audio round. . .State the Capital

LIGHTNING ROUND

SMART-ASS POINTS

THE TEXT MESSAGE CHALLENGE

THREE-WAY FINALE!

Starring the Trivia Whisperer, Noah Tarnow.

If this will be your first time meeting the Happy Hour Crew, check out the photos of those who RSVPd Yes so you can find the group.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Five minute walk from Harvard Square station (red line).

If you need help coming up with a team name here are few suggestions:

Drinking Buddies

Thinking Buddies

Bent Elbow Crew

Smahties

Drinking With Strangers

$maht A$$e$

Titantic Swim Team

Know It Alls

Trivial Pursuers

Trivia Addicts

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing orange peace sign beads
item.name: The Biq Quiz Thing - Monday July 30th 7:30 PM
